## Usage Example

### Monolithic
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files application_ota.bin -type bin -version 86 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true

#### With Authentication
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files application_ota.bin -type bin -version 86 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true -authorPrivateKey debf91efe6a36c27e27af9a5ef35c5d14c918d1201e2067d2fe7f9051e1c50ed -projectPublicKey 

### Diferential
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files ../esp32/micropython/suit.py,../esp32/micropython/main.py -type py -version 86 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true

#### With Authentication
python3 iotaDeployTool.py -uuid 1 -files ../esp32/micropython/suit.py,../esp32/micropython/main.py -type py -version 86 -dateExpiration 2020-06-05 -debug true -authorPrivateKey debf91efe6a36c27e27af9a5ef35c5d14c918d1201e2067d2fe7f9051e1c50ed -projectPublicKey
